plot: Key members of the cast and crew, from director Peter Segal to Stallone and De Niro to Alan Arkin and more, sit down to discuss the movie, its tone and characters, Stallone's fight choreography, and other highlights of the production.
title: The Bull & the Stallion
plot_es: Key members of the cast and crew, from director Peter Segal to Stallone and De Niro to Alan Arkin and more, sit down to discuss the movie, its tone and characters, Stallone's fight choreography, and other highlights of the production.
plot_en: Key members of the cast and crew, from director Peter Segal to Stallone and De Niro to Alan Arkin and more, sit down to discuss the movie, its tone and characters, Stallone's fight choreography, and other highlights of the production.
